name: Tommy Himi
effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost. [On Play] Trash 3 digivolution cards from the bottom of 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking][Once Per Turn] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards can't attack or block.
